author: elayne_malachite
content: Wasn’t the basefee supposed to start at 1 since it couldn’t grow if it ever hit 0 since it was a percent growth?

author: ajsutton
content: There's minimum growth amount so it doesn't get stuck at 0 now.

author: abdel.stark
content: Initial base fee at fork block is 10^9 wei

author: abdel.stark
content: It applies also for LegacyTransactions and EIP2930 transactions.  In both cases this is the value specified in gas price field of the transaction because they will always pay `max_fee_per_gas` which is `transaction.gas_price` for legacy transactions and  `transaction.payload.gas_price` for 2930 transactions
